Wow. What a total piece of shit. Just... wow. This awful program managed to drag my computer down to a screeching halt. Totally froze, took about 10 minutes to get to .60% complete for converting a h.264 mkv video at 1880kbps to an h.264 lower res mp4 at 700kbps. All the apps took 30 seconds each to respond (like to switch windows or move a window). I CLOSED the program and it took another 10 minutes of agony to actually regain any kind of control over the system. Never again.
Spunkster,  Perhaps your PC is too old to handle this software?  Also, don't just criticize, but suggest alternative software.
